author: Jean-Pierre
content:
This looks badly planned unless some information is missing. It should have a simple snorkel with float valve for air circulation. The saddle tanks worry me, could they be ripped off in a storm and leave holes in the hull, they should have been integrated into the form.
The rig looks incredibly fragile. I wonder how far he will get before needing an expensive rescue.

author: Doug Bostrom
content:
“Red Bull would back him but the firm declined saying of the challenge it was ‘inspirational, but mad’.”

Red Bull baulked? Yikes!

Short enough to dock easily– there’s that. But with docking only happening every 60 days or more, less of a factor?
